title: Disconnecting with Low Ping
body:
I have 1.0 Gbps internet with 36 ping, yet I always disconnect during games. Is there a fix for this? I am using the legacy client.

I have no other devices on the internet either. I haven't had this problem before I don't think. Please help.

Thanks

replies.body: Even with solid internet, you can have network problems specifically connecting to the game server.  My suggestion would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)  guide for some troubleshooting steps towards a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I've tried everything on here and it still disconnects. Could it be a computer issue?

Thanks

There could be a program blocking your connection, or maybe even a hardware issue.  I can't really say for sure, so let's take a closer look!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help.  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and grab some logs to attach in it for context.  We'll reply back asap!
